Cliviger Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
cliviger-contest

Own Choice from a Specified List
Bull's Head, Cliviger, Lancashire, England, UK Promoted by Cliviger Brass Band Prizes: £12, £8, £5, £3, £1 March: Hebden & Irwell shared 1st place Choice of 2 test pieces "Anna Bolena" or "Songs of Ireland". 9 bands competed.
Aug. 26, 2013, 7:54 p.m. Aug. 28, 2018, 10:30 a.m.
1 Rochdale Public William Rimmer Anna Bolena [unknown arranger]

3 Irwell Springs William Rimmer Songs of Ireland
